name: Turbo Racer 3D
overview: Originally released as a shareware game on Aminet in 1997, this game was slightly reworked and repackaged by well known nefarious ne'er do wells, Mediasoft and released commercially in 1999. Shipped in a standard CD-R jewel box with inlay created with a laser printer. This is a single player driving game where you avoid obstacles and keep your computer opponent (the blue cars) in your rear-view.
